name: Radiant Rose Bouquet
description: A vibrant bouquet of fresh roses in assorted colors, perfect for celebrating birthdays, anniversaries, or simply to brighten someone's day. The radiant hues symbolize love and passion.

name: Sunshine Delight
description: Bright and cheerful flowers like sunflowers and daisies that bring a burst of happiness to any room. Ideal for gift-giving or to cheer yourself up on a gloomy day.

name: Elegant Lily
description: An elegant arrangement of white and pink lilies, symbolizing purity and beauty. This bouquet is perfect for weddings or as a heartfelt gift to express admiration.

name: Blissful Blooms
description: A delightful mix of seasonal flowers that brings joy and freshness to any occasion. Perfect for housewarming gifts or simply to add a splash of color to your home.

name: Classic Floral Mix
description: A timeless combination of classic flowers like roses, lilies, and daisies, making it suitable for any event from weddings to birthdays.

name: Whimsical Wildflowers
description: A charming bouquet of assorted wildflowers that captures the essence of nature. Perfect for casual settings and outdoor celebrations.

name: Charming Orchid
description: A stunning display of vibrant orchids that add elegance and a touch of exotic beauty to any space. Ideal for upscale events or as a thoughtful gift.

name: Peony Paradise
description: A lush arrangement of peonies that create a romantic atmosphere. This bouquet is perfect for anniversaries or weddings, conveying deep affection.

name: Serene Garden
description: A beautiful mix of succulents and low-maintenance plants that require minimal care. Ideal for those who appreciate nature's beauty without the hassle.

name: Delightful Daisy
description: A cheerful bouquet of daisies that symbolize innocence and purity. Perfect for brightening someone's day or as a charming addition to your home decor.

name: Tulip Ensemble
description: An elegant arrangement of tulips in various colors, making it a stunning centerpiece for springtime celebrations and gatherings.

name: Vibrant Bouquet
description: A colorful mix of seasonal flowers that brings joy and vibrancy to any space. Perfect for festive occasions or simply to brighten your day.

name: Romantic Blooms
description: A lush and romantic arrangement of hydrangeas that evoke feelings of love and passion. Ideal for anniversaries or special occasions.

name: Stunning Protea
description: A unique arrangement featuring striking protea flowers, perfect for those looking to make a bold statement in their decor.

name: Graceful Lily
description: An elegant bouquet of calla lilies, symbolizing beauty and sophistication, perfect for weddings or upscale events.

name: Chic Flower Crown
description: A stylish flower crown made with fresh blooms, perfect for festivals, parties, and special occasions to add a whimsical touch.
